articles.description: Deep Nostalgia is an AI tool from MyHeritage that uses its photo animation feature to create realistic video footage from old photos. People are using it to animate historical figures, their ancestors, even paintings. It’s both fascinating and eerie.
articles.content: How eerie were the moving Hogwarts portraits in the Harry Potter film series? They featured subjects who have passed away but are able to move with lifelike precision. What if I told you an AI tool c… [+3604 chars]
